subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
Citizens Bank Park (Philadelphia, Pa)
lead_paragraph: Cliff Lee says the chance to be part of a historic rotation and a winning team, the lack of a D.H. and the presence of rabid fans lured him back to Philadelphia.
snippet: Cliff Lee says the chance to be part of a historic rotation and a winning team, the lack of a D.H. and the presence of rabid fans lured him back to Philadelphia.
